description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a man sits behind a small table writing on a piece of paper in front of him; his forearms are resting on the table
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 2) | LR of sheet, in pencil: Gogol : der Mantel. / LL of sheet, in pencil: Sonderdruck / E.56
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: BC in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: The Titular Councilor Akaki Akakiyevich, Plate 2 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
